content.question: The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals log subscript 4 open parentheses 16 over x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mfenced><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mi>x</mi></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Of the following, solving which equation gives the solution to <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="log subscript 4 16 minus ln open parentheses x over 4 close parentheses equals 5"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mn>16</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="log subscript 4 16 minus fraction numerator ln space x over denominator ln space 4 end fraction equals 5"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mn>16</mn><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo> </mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo> </mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="ln open parentheses x over 4 close parentheses minus log subscript 4 16 equals 5"><semantics><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator ln space x over denominator ln space 4 end fraction minus log subscript 4 16 equals 5"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo> </mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo> </mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="log subscript 4 16 minus fraction numerator ln space x over denominator ln space 4 end fraction equals 5"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mn>16</mn><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo> </mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo> </mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
